1507330.name: Kevin's Path to Wizdom: Original Soundtrack
1507330.description:
The official soundtrack for Kevin's Path to Wizdom is finally here! First released alongside the original Wizard on July 23rd 2014, the soundtrack has been fully reorchestrated, remixed, remastered, and extended by 10 newly-composed tracks to complement the expanded and overhauled levels!

The soundtrack is composed by Hannes Flor and available in 320kbps MP3 and FLAC. It also includes the original Wizard soundtrack (only available in MP3), so you can see how far it's come since its first release 10 years ago!
